channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Irv Gotti, music executive who founded Murder, Inc., dies at 54
item.description: Irv Gotti, the famed hip-hop music executive from NYC, has died at the age of 54, Def Jam confirms.

item.description: A terrorist attack in New Orleans on New Year's Day that killed 14 people rattled the city. Some worry it remains vulnerable.

item.title: How much are Super Bowl 2025 tickets? Average, cheapest, priciest seats
item.description: From the cheapest to priciest seats, here's how much Super Bowl tickets cost in 2025.

item.title: Scientists Simulated Bennu Crashing to Earth in September 2182. It's Not Pretty.

item.title: Suitcase with human remains inside discovered in New York City's East River
item.description: Human remains have been found in a suitcase that was drifting in the East River in New York City, police said.

item.title: Protesters in cities across the US rally against Trump’s policies, Project 2025 and Elon Musk
item.description: Demonstrators have gathered in cities across the U.S. to protest the Trump administration’s early actions.

item.title: WATCH: Unconscious man rescued from spinning boat
item.description: Emergency crews rushed to a lake near Orlando, Florida, where a boat was spinning in circles, apparently out of control.
